detectors.description:

	- ERC20.symbol() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Chonker.sol#496-498) (function)

	- INLINE ASM (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Chonker.sol#312)

Address._functionCallWithValue(address,bytes,uint256,string) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Chonker.sol#398-419) uses assembly
	- INLINE ASM (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Chonker.sol#411-414)

detectors.description:
Low level call in Address.sendValue(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Chonker.sol#332-338):
	- (success) = recipient.call{value: amount}() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Chonker.sol#336)

Low level call in Address._functionCallWithValue(address,bytes,uint256,string) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Chonker.sol#398-419):
	- (success,returndata) = target.call{value: weiValue}(data) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Chonker.sol#402)

Chonker.constructor() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Chonker.sol#736-738) uses literals with too many digits:
	- _mint(0x8C4d15Bf08b4F2730c0aaaa52CaC6130b77e7681,39000000000000000000000) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Chonker.sol#737)
